name: Spray Cap Stool (Yellow)
description:
An enlarged spray cap stool. Originaly titled the ‘Areostool’ first produced in 2004 by ALEX GARNETT for MIXKO. The stools are manufactured by hand in GRP with a high gloss finish. They are suitable for outdoor use.

Dimensions (cm): 40 x 48 x 48

Materials: GRP, vinyl nozzle

*There are 2 similar design concepts on the market. This is the first registered design 2004©. Buy with confidence, support original design!

name: Spray Cap Stool
description:
An enlarged spray cap stool. Originaly titled the ‘Areostool’ first produced in 2004 by ALEX GARNETT for MIXKO. The stools are manufactured by hand in GRP with a high gloss finish and different vinyl colour nozzles. They are suitable for outdoor use. Allow 3 weeks for production.

Dimensions (cm): 40 x 48 x 48

Materials: GRP, vinyl nozzle

*There are 2 similar design concepts on the market. This is the first registered design 2004©. Buy with confidence, support original design!

name: Funkey Stool
description:
An enlarged computer key stool. The stools are manufactured by hand in GRP with a high gloss finish and vinyl lettering. They are stackable and suitable for outdoor use.

Choose from any colours I have in stock, always available are: black, white, red, grey. Choose text from; 'Del', 'Esc', 'Pause', 'Self Destruct', 'Alt', 'Home' (or supply your own in vector file format). Please specify choice on payment.

Allow 3 weeks for production.

Dimensions (cm): 40 x 58 x 58

Materials: GRP, vinyl lettering

For additional £25 we can produce any colours from the RAL or BS range as well as custom graphics.

name: Mug Chair
description:
A giant mug that functions as a sculpture/chair/table. Manufactured by hand in GRP with a high gloss finish and vinyl graphic. Suitable for outdoor use.

Pictured 'I love New York' design produced from an edition of 10.

Allow 5 weeks for production. + shipping (quoted on request).

Dimensions (cm): 70 x 82 x 70

Materials: GRP, vinyl graphic

Cable - 45cm long (can extend if you request)

Material: Earthenware

name: Old Skull Ring
description:
Ceramic (bone china) Skull Ring - currently on sale to make way for the new + more deatiled version (perforated cheeks)

Available sizes (mm): 14, 15, 16, 17, 18, 19, 20, 21, 22 (sizes measured across the internal diameter)

Whilst not indestructible they are durable in order to fulfil their function.

'Bone china is a type of porcelain that is composed of bone ash, feldspathic material and kaolin. It has been defined as 'ware with a translucent body containing a minimum of 30% of phosphate derived from animal bone and calculated calcium phosphate. Developed by English potter Josiah Spode, bone china is known for its high level of whiteness & translucency, and very high mechanical strength and chip resistance. Compared to most porcelain bodies bone china has superior whiteness and translucency. Also, its high strength allows it to be produced in thinner cross-sections than other types of porcelain.' 
- Wikipedia

*Some rings are labeled 'MIXKO' (my previous company) inside rather than 'ALEX GARNETT'.

Developed by English potter Josiah Spode, bone china is known for its high level of whiteness & translucency, and very high mechanical strength and chip resistance. name: Basket Bowl
description:
The Basket Bowl is a life like ceramic perfect for the living room of any fan of the game or admirer of the works of Jeff Koons. At a practical 27 x 27cm it makes a pristine imitation of the real thing - skillfully cast by hand, all mould lines are hidden along the seams of the ball, which are hand painted. This design makes a comeback in a larger size and either white or tan colours. Previous versions were mass-produced under license to SUCK UK.  

Dimensions (cm): H17 D27 W27

Material: Earthenware, hand painted

name: Rugby Bowl
description:
The Rugby Bowl is a lifelike ceramic perfect for the living room of any fan of the game. At a practical 32 x 20cm. It makes a pristine imitation of the real thing - minus mud, grass stains and blood! 

Dimensions (cm): H11 D20 W32

Material: Earthenware, white glaze, digital decal

name: Foot Bowl (Africa)
description:
A high quality ceramic fruit bowl with a realistic finish, in this case a limited edition based on the African "Jabulani" ball used in the 2010 World Cup. A stylish ball, but some players, and especially goalies, complained about it's lightness. Perhaps this is a better use for it! Perfect for any fan of the beautiful game.

Dimensions (cm): H10 D23 W23

Material: Earthenware, white glaze, digital decals, gold lustre

name: 'Conceptual Crap' (Toilet Sticker)
description:
Transform your toilet into a DADA work of art with the aid of this custom sticker! 

Easy to apply, waterproof, long life, vinyl sticker. 13.5/6.5 cm.

Application Instructions;

- Ensure that the surface you are applying your sticker to is clean and dry.
- Peel sticker and application tape together from backing paper and apply.
- Press out any air bubbles, firmly securing sticker to surface.
- Remove application tape, ensuring sticker has adhered to surface.

Background;

The R. Mutt Sticker pays tribute to Marcel Duchamp, who challenged people to ask themselves "What is art?". In 1917 Marcel Duchamp signed a urinal "R Mutt" and declared it art. Titled 'The Fountain', it is one of the pieces which he called readymades (also known as found art), because he made use of an already existing object. The art show to which Duchamp submitted the piece stated that all works would be accepted, but Fountain was not actually displayed, and the original has been lost. The work is regarded by some as a major landmark in 20th century art. Replicas commissioned by Duchamp in the 1960s are now on display in a number of different museums.
